mapper.sql: ORDER_NO, USER_ID, OUT_PARKING_ID, PARKING_NAME, CAR_NUMBER, OUT_ORDER_NO, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_TIME, PAY_TIME, PAY_TYPE, PAY_MONEY, IN_TIME, PARKING_ID, IN_DURATION, CARD_NUMBER, DISCOUNT_MONEY, PAID_MONEY, SELLER_ID, OUT_TIME, ORDER_SYN_STATUS, car_id,car_type,car_color,order_trade, REFUND_MONEY,agreement_status,update_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from park.TB_ORDER
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into park.TB_ORDER (ORDER_NO, USER_ID, OUT_PARKING_ID, PARKING_NAME, CAR_NUMBER, OUT_ORDER_NO, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_TIME, PAY_TIME, PAY_TYPE, PAY_MONEY, IN_TIME, PARKING_ID, IN_DURATION, CARD_NUMBER, DISCOUNT_MONEY, PAID_MONEY, SELLER_ID, OUT_TIME, ORDER_SYN_STATUS, car_type, car_color,order_trade,order_pay_status,agreement_status,update_time ) values (#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outParkingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parkingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parkingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paidMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderSynStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{carColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{orderTrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderPayStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{agreementStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into park.TB_ORDER_PAY (order_id, ORDER_NO, USER_ID, OUT_PARKING_ID, PARKING_NAME, CAR_NUMBER, OUT_ORDER_NO, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_TIME, PAY_TIME, PAY_TYPE, PAY_MONEY, IN_TIME, PARKING_ID, IN_DURATION, CARD_NUMBER, DISCOUNT_MONEY, PAID_MONEY, SELLER_ID, OUT_TIME, ORDER_SYN_STATUS, car_type, car_color,order_trade,OUT_REFUND_NO,order_pay_status,agreement_status,update_time ) values (park.seq_parkid.nextval,#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outParkingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parkingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parkingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paidMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderSynStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{carColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{orderTrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{outRefundNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderPayStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{agreementStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update park.TB_ORDER
ORDER_NO =#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUT_PARKING_ID = #{outParkingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARKING_NAME = #{parkingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CAR_NUMBER = #{carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TIME = #{orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_TIME = #{payTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_MONEY = #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IN_TIME = #{inTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARKING_ID = #{parkingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IN_DURATION = #{inDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_NUMBER = #{cardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISCOUNT_MONEY = #{discountMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAID_MONEY = #{paidMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SELLER_ID = #{sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUT_TIME = #{outTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_SYN_STATUS = #{orderSynStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_pay_status = #{orderPayStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUT_REFUND_NO = #{outRefundNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agreement_status = #{agreementStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where out_order_no = #{outOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update park.TB_ORDER_PAY
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUT_PARKING_ID = #{outParkingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARKING_NAME = #{parkingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CAR_NUMBER = #{carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TIME = #{orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_TIME = #{payTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_MONEY = #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IN_TIME = #{inTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARKING_ID = #{parkingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IN_DURATION = #{inDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_NUMBER = #{cardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISCOUNT_MONEY = #{discountMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAID_MONEY = #{paidMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SELLER_ID = #{sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUT_TIME = #{outTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_SYN_STATUS = #{orderSynStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

refund_money = #{refundMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update park.TB_ORDER set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUT_PARKING_ID = #{outParkingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARKING_NAME = #{parkingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_NUMBER = #{carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUT_ORDER_NO = #{outOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TIME = #{orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_TIME = #{payTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_MONEY = #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IN_TIME = #{inTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARKING_ID = #{parkingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IN_DURATION = #{inDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_NUMBER = #{cardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISCOUNT_MONEY = #{discountMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAID_MONEY = #{paidMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SELLER_ID = #{sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUT_TIME = #{outTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_SYN_STATUS = #{orderSynStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_pay_status = #{orderPayStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_money = #{refundMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agreement_status = #{agreementStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where out_order_no = #{outOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select nvl(sum(p.paid_money),0) from park.TB_ORDER_PAY p where p.order_trade = #{orderTrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select nvl(sum(p.paid_money),0) from park.TB_ORDER p where p.order_trade = #{orderTrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update tb_order o where o.agreement_status = #{agreementStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where o.car_number = #{carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_date(o.update_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') < to_date(#{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
